member.name: M:AhDai.Core.Extensions.HttpRequestExtensions.MobileDeviceRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
(iemobile|iphone|ipod|android|nokia|sonyericsson|blackberry|samsung|sec\\-|windows ce|motorola|mot\\-|up.b|midp\\-)
Options:
RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match with 10 alternative expressions, atomically.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Ii\u0130].
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Ee].
○ Match a character in the set [Mm].
○ Match a character in the set [Oo].
○ Match a character in the set [Bb].
○ Match a character in the set [Ii\u0130].
○ Match a character in the set [Ll].
○ Match a character in the set [Ee].
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Pp].
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [Hh].
○ Match a character in the set [Oo].
○ Match a character in the set [Nn].
○ Match a character in the set [Ee].
○ Match a sequence of expressions.

member.summary: Determine whether at base.runtextpos is a match for the regular expression.
member.param: The text being scanned by the regular expression.
member.returns: true if the regular expression matches at the current position; otherwise, false.
